mapper.select: select lakerhome.Product.* from lakerhome.Product where Product.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%')
select lakerhome.Product.* from lakerhome.Product where owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select lakerhome.Product.* from lakerhome.Product , lakerhome.ShoppingCart where Product.Id = ShoppingCart.product_id and lakerhome.Product.deal_state = 1 and ShoppingCart.user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
